mapper.insert: insert into knowledge_point (ID, `NAME`, SUBJECT_ID, EDUCATIONAL_STAGE_ID, PARENT_ID, `DEPTH`, URL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{educationalStageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{depth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update knowledge_point set `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EDUCATIONAL_STAGE_ID = #{educationalStageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, `DEPTH` = #{depth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, `NAME`, SUBJECT_ID, EDUCATIONAL_STAGE_ID, PARENT_ID, `DEPTH`, URL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_ID from knowledge_point where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
